languages.text: "Даже не мечтай, старик, их интересует только десятина. Коронус может хоть вверх дном перевернуться — они ухом не поведут".

traits.locale_text: "Даже не мечтай, старик, их интересует только десятина. Коронус может хоть вверх дном перевернуться — они ухом не поведут".

languages.text: "Not happening, old man — all they care about is the tithe. Even if the Koronus Expanse turned upside down, they wouldn't bat an eye."
languages.original_text: "Даже не мечтай, старик, их интересует только десятина. Коронус может хоть вверх дном перевернуться — они ухом не поведут".

traits.locale_text: "Not happening, old man — all they care about is the tithe. Even if the Koronus Expanse turned upside down, they wouldn't bat an eye."
"Not happening, old man — all they care about is the tithe. Even if the Koronus Expanse turned upside down, they wouldn't bat an eye."
"Not happening, old man — all they care about is the tithe. Even if the Koronus Expanse turned upside down, they wouldn't bat an eye."
"Not happening, old man — all they care about is the tithe. Even if the Koronus Expanse turned upside down, they wouldn't bat an eye."
"Not happening, old man — all they care about is the tithe. Even if the Koronus Expanse turned upside down, they wouldn't bat an eye."
"Not happening, old man — all they care about is the tithe. Even if the Koronus Expanse turned upside down, they wouldn't bat an eye."

languages.text: 「無理だよ、おじいちゃん。あいつらが気にしてるのは租税だけさ。コロヌス・エクスパンスがひっくり返ったって、見向きもしないわ」
languages.original_text: "Not happening, old man — all they care about is the tithe. Even if the Koronus Expanse turned upside down, they wouldn't bat an eye."

traits.locale_text: 「無理だよ、おじいちゃん。あいつらが気にしてるのは租税だけさ。コロヌス・エクスパンスがひっくり返ったって、見向きもしないわ」

languages.text: "Das könnt Ihr vergessen, alter Mann. Die interessiert nur der Zehnt. Sie würden nicht einmal mit der Wimper zucken, wenn die Koronus-Ausdehnung auf den Kopf gestellt wird."
languages.original_text: "Not happening, old man — all they care about is the tithe. Even if the Koronus Expanse turned upside down, they wouldn't bat an eye."

traits.locale_text: "Das könnt Ihr vergessen, alter Mann. Die interessiert nur der Zehnt. Sie würden nicht einmal mit der Wimper zucken, wenn die Koronus-Ausdehnung auf den Kopf gestellt wird."

languages.text: « Vous rêvez, mon vieux. Tout ce qui les intéresse, c'est la dîme. Même si les Étendues de Koronus se retrouvaient sens dessus dessous, ils ne lèveraient pas le petit doigt. »
languages.original_text: "Not happening, old man — all they care about is the tithe. Even if the Koronus Expanse turned upside down, they wouldn't bat an eye."

traits.locale_text: « Vous rêvez, mon vieux. Tout ce qui les intéresse, c'est la dîme. Même si les Étendues de Koronus se retrouvaient sens dessus dessous, ils ne lèveraient pas le petit doigt. »

languages.text: «No caerá esa breva, anciano; lo único que les importa es el diezmo. No se inmutarían ni aunque la Extensión de Koronus se volviera del revés».
languages.original_text: "Not happening, old man — all they care about is the tithe. Even if the Koronus Expanse turned upside down, they wouldn't bat an eye."

traits.locale_text: «No caerá esa breva, anciano; lo único que les importa es el diezmo. No se inmutarían ni aunque la Extensión de Koronus se volviera del revés».

languages.text: “想都别想，老家伙，他们唯一在乎的事情就是什一税。就算科罗努斯扩区翻了个底朝天，他们的眼睛也眨都不眨。”
languages.original_text: "Not happening, old man — all they care about is the tithe. Even if the Koronus Expanse turned upside down, they wouldn't bat an eye."

traits.locale_text: “想都别想，老家伙，他们唯一在乎的事情就是什一税。就算科罗努斯扩区翻了个底朝天，他们的眼睛也眨都不眨。”

languages.text: "Rüyanda görürsün ihtiyar. Tek dertleri aşar. Koronus Enginliği tersine dönse bile kılları kıpırdamaz."
languages.original_text: "Not happening, old man — all they care about is the tithe. Even if the Koronus Expanse turned upside down, they wouldn't bat an eye."

traits.locale_text: "Rüyanda görürsün ihtiyar. Tek dertleri aşar. Koronus Enginliği tersine dönse bile kılları kıpırdamaz."

languages.original_text: "Not happening, old man — all they care about is the tithe. Even if the Koronus Expanse turned upside down, they wouldn't bat an eye."
